text: Ane temane te divasa yada karavo, jemam allaha temane ekatham karase (to te lokone evum lagase) ke te loko (duniyamam) akha divasani eka pala rahya hoya, ane ekabijani olakha mate rokaya hoya, ni:Sanka nukasanamam rahya te loko jemane allahani pase pacha pharavane juthalavyum ane te loko satya margadarsanane apanavanara na hata
